Tools description.message: Webmaker-työkalujen avulla asioiden luominen verkossa on helppoa. Luo omia verkkosivujasi, interaktiivisia videoita, mobiilisovelluksia ja paljon muuta — opit samalla verkon mekaniikkaa, koodausta ja muita tärkeitä taitoja.
Tools description.description: a description of the webmaker tools

Sign up for Webmaker announcement list.message: Sign up for the Webmaker announcement list.

Resources for teaching the web.description: Heading for the second explore subsection with document stacks

Suggest your own links and resources.message: Tämä sivu muuttuu! Ehdota uusia linkkejä ja resursseja tänne lisättäväksi. Tai tule mukaan.

Visit our communications wiki.message: Visit our communications wiki to find even more places you can reach us.

Jump right in.description: headline for third section on home page

Explore Webmaker.description: headline on first topic of 'jump right in' on home page

More Resources.description: See more kits in a search

Start Teaching.description: Teach site referral button text on Home page

Connect through social media.message: Connect through social media and see what people are making, follow events from around the world and check out new Webmaker projects by visiting our Tumblr, Twitter, Facebook, Flickr, YouTube and our blog.

Teaching kits.description: First square in contribute grid on explore

Teaching kits desc.description: Copy for first square in contribute grid on explore

Receive occasional email updates.message: Receive occasional email updates only about the most important stuff—about once a month.

Build the web with others.message: Rakenna verkkoa muiden kanssa paikallisessa tapahtumassa tai löydä resursseja oman tapahtuman järjestämiseen.
Build the web with others.description: copy for third topic of 'jump right in' on home page

Making is the basis of everything we do..message: Making is the basis of everything we do. Try remixing one of our starter resources, or make something from scratch using X-Ray Goggles, Thimble, or Popcorn Maker. Then share it with the world using hashtag #webmaker.

Receiving your opinions on the Webmaker.message: Receiving your opinions on the Webmaker experience is important to us. In fact, your feedback is the first thing we take into account when we plan future improvements to the site. Please take a minute to tell us what you like about the site, what doesn’t work how you expected it would and what could be better.

Mozilla is a nonprofit organization.message: Mozilla on yleishyödyllinen järjestö, ja nämä avoimen lähdekoodin työkalut on luonut maailmanlaajuinen yhteisömme. Ne ovat täysin ilmaisia — nyt ja ikuisesti!
Mozilla is a nonprofit organization.description: Value description for free on home page

Privacy matters.description: Text on back side of privacy day eyeball on home

Mozilla’s free tools.message: Mozillan ilmaiset työkalut auttavat sinua rakentamaan verkkoa ja opit samalla uusia taitoja.

We believe that digital literacy is more.message: Uskomme, että digitaalinen lukutaito on muutakin kuin koodauksen opettelemista. Työkalujemme, opiskeluresurssiemme ja yhteisömme avulla kenestä vain voi tulla nettikansalainen.
We believe that digital literacy is more.description: Value description for more than code on home page

Learn to Teach.description: headline on second topic of 'jump right in' on home page

Partner desc.description: Copy for sixth square in contribute grid on explore

Resources section description.message: Resurssit-osio Webmakerissa on oppaasi verkkolukutaitoon. Löydä uusia voimia, kuten koodaus, tarinankerronta, verkkoyksityisyyden suojaaminen ja paljon muuta. Jokaisessa osiossa on linkkejä tutkittavaksi, projekteja luotavaksi sekä aktiviteetteja opettamiseen.
Resources section description.description: Copy for the second explore subsection with document stacks

Translate.description: Third square in contribute grid on explore

Get involved with webmaker.message: Webmaker on osa Mozillan yleishyödyllistä tehtävää luoda avoimempi verkkolukutaitoinen maailma.
Get involved with webmaker.description: Copy for first explore subsection with map

Skills.description: Title for list of web literacy skills

Design.description: Fourth square in contribute grid on explore

Start Creating.description: button text on footer on home

As a non-profit organization, we depend.message: As a non-profit organization, we depend on the generosity of people like you to fund our goal of encouraging millions of people around the world to move beyond using the web to making it.

All Webmaker tools are open source..message: All Webmaker tools are open source. Contribute ideas, patches, bugs or your own demos and prototypes. Access documentation, issue trackers and more.

Want to teach the web to others?.description: Teach site referral heading on Home page

Study at your own pace.message: Opiskele omaan tahtiisi opettamaan verkkolukutaitoa, digitaalitaitoja ja avoimuuden käytäntöjä.

When you file your bug, be sure to use f.message: When you file your bug, be sure to put “Feedback” in the Status Whiteboard field so we can find it.
When you file your bug, be sure to use f.description: explainer text for status whiteboard on Feedback

Footer header.description: Header for bottom section of explore

Our team uses an issue tracker called Bu.message: Our team uses an issue tracker called Bugzilla for filing bugs and monitoring fixes. Anyone can submit a bug. And just because it’s called a “bug” doesn’t necessarily mean there’s something wrong; it can be an idea you have for a feature, a note about how much you like something or a non-technical suggestion for improvements.

noStaffPick.message: Suositeltuja opetusresursseja ei vielä ole. Lähetä uusi.

Mozilla Webmaker creates software, proje.message: Mozilla Webmaker creates software, projects and events that promote web literacy through making and sharing. We’re an open source project powered by makers, mentors and community leaders. We’d love you to get involved.
Mozilla Webmaker creates software, proje.description: copy for ‘9 ways to get involved’

Join our community call.message: Join our community calls every Tuesday. All are welcome! Ask questions, meet our community and staff and find the resources you need.

Code desc.message: Lähetä vikailmoituksia, korjauksia tai luo uutta MakeAPI:n avulla.

make-learn-teach-section-info.message: The Webmaker community gets together at events around the world—at libraries, community centers, internet cafes, or in your own living room. Find an event near you, learn how to host your own, or get involved with our global Maker Party (July to Sep 2014).

connect in many ways..message: We’re a big community and we connect in many ways.

Participate in user testing.message: Participate in user testing, give feedback, or help with QA. Your testing and ideas will make Mozilla Webmaker products better and help shape their future.

Status Whiteboard:.description: label for faux bugzilla field on Feedback

new Webmaker tools and projects.message: Be the first to try out new Webmaker tools and projects.

Code.description: Fifth square in contribute grid on explore

Login to submit a resource.description: A button Login to submit a resource.

Contribute subsection copy.message: Webmaker on avoimen lähdekoodin, yhteisön tuottama ja Mozillan voittoa tavoitteleman tehtävän tukema projekti, jonka tavoitteena on luoda ja turvata avoin netti. Meistä olisi mahtavaa, jos tulisit mukaan.
Contribute subsection copy.description: Copy for the contribute subsection of explore

Investigate the tools, learning resource.message: Tutki työkaluja, oppimisresursseja ja yhteisöä, jonka Webmaker tarjoaa.

Webmaker helps people across the world.message: Webmaker auttaa ihmisiä ympäri maailman luomaan ilmaista ja avointa verkkoa.

Free tools that make it easy to create a.message: Ilmaisia työkaluja, joiden avulla on helppo luoda ja oppia
Free tools that make it easy to create a.description: Header for section that includes description of webmaker tools

or remix someone elses.description: headline for gallery section of Make Your Own

You don’t need to be a wizard to teach t.message: You don’t need to be a wizard to teach the web. We’ve created hackable guides for teaching web literacy, webmaking, online storytelling and more. Want to create your own lesson plan? We have great templates for that.

Join Mozillas community of educators.message: Join Mozilla's community of educators who teach digital skills and web literacy.
Join Mozillas community of educators.description: Teach site referral description on Home page

Our values.description: Headline on second section of home

From hack jams to pop ups to the global.message: From hack jams to pop ups to the global Maker Party, there’s an event to suit every interest. Search for one near you or host your own — we have guides to show you how.
From hack jams to pop ups to the global.description: Find or host an event copy

Events desc.description: Copy for second square in contribute grid on explore

Mentoring is a chance to share your know.message: Mentoring is a chance to share your knowledge and provide feedback directly to learners of all ages around the world who are hungry for digital skills.

Opportunities to get involved.message: The Webmaker team periodically posts opportunities for people to test our site, tools and training resources. To get involved participate in one of our many community testing sessions, visit the wiki page for more information.
Opportunities to get involved.description: copy to encourage people to get involved in testing

Discover creative ways to teach and lear.message: Löydä luovia tapoja opettaa ja oppia digitaalisia supervoimia
Discover creative ways to teach and lear.description: Heading for first explore subsection with map

Thimble Desc.description: Make and publish your own web page.

We all use the web in different ways..message: Käytämme kaikki verkkoa eri tavoin. Mozilla haluaa auttaa luomaan verkkosisältöä, joka on merkityksellistä ystävillesi, perheellesi, yrityksellesi tai yhteisöllesi — asuitpa missä tahansa.
We all use the web in different ways..description: Value description for local on home page

We’re always eager to learn how Webmaker.message: We’re always eager to learn how Webmaker is used to teach the web to diverse audiences. If you have stories about using Webmaker in your community, please join the Webmaker newsgroup and share your feedback by email. You can also participate in conversations on Twitter by replying to @webmaker or using the hashtag #teachtheweb.
We’re always eager to learn how Webmaker.description: copy encouraging people to get involved on Feedback

active daily discussion paragraph.message: This is a more active daily discussion where you can help shape the direction of the Webmaker project.

Do you have a web literacy project?.message: Onko sinulla verkkolukutaitoprojekti? Haluaisimme kuulla siitä ja mahdollisesti jakaa sen Webmaker.orgissa.
